analysis.key_quote: By putting these civil servants in a situation where they can be fired at will, their ability to speak truth to power will be significantly diminished.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization, the loss of merit-based protections, and the potential for a culture of fear among civil servants. It emphasizes the importance of experienced professionals and the detrimental effects of the rule on their ability to provide unbiased advice.
